messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, kbcdlovejo@a... wrote:
>
> I want to remind everyone that I have plenty of wonderful,
professionally recorded CDs from the 2005 conference. I also have some
tapes left from the 2003 and 2002 conferences (but not all are still
available).


I just wanted to jump on this and say that I really enjoyed the CDs I
purchased so far: the ones with Pam and Roya, Robyn, and Sandra's
about "Unforseen Benefits." I have never met any of you guys or been
to a conference, so it was cool to be able to attach a voice with your
posts.

I'm hoping to order a few more when the holidays wind down ...

Thanks
Jenny

messages.subject: conference CDs
messages.msgSnippet: I want to remind everyone that I have plenty of wonderful, professionally recorded CDs from the 2005 conference. I also have some tapes left from the 2003 and
messages.messageBody:
I want to remind everyone that I have plenty of wonderful, professionally recorded CDs from the 2005 conference. I also have some tapes left from the 2003 and 2002 conferences (but not all are still available).

I know that CDs are really easy to duplicate, and I realize that many of you would chose to do that rather than pay *me* for originals! <g> But please also understand that if I can't sell these, I will NOT be taping future conferences!

It was a very expensive endeavor for me, and I won't be able to make such a commitment in future years if these CDs aren't sold.

So....I'm suggesting Live and Learn Conference CDs as gifts for that special someone on your list this year!

Ho Ho HO!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
